name: perl-list-someutils

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Provide the stuff missing in List::Util

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-module-implementation
dependencies.description: Loads one of several alternate underlying implementations for a module

dependencies.name: perl-test-leaktrace
dependencies.description:
Test::LeakTrace provides several functions that trace memory leaks. This
module scans arenas, the memory allocation system, so it can detect any
leaked SVs in given blocks.

dependent_to.name: perl-perl-critic
dependent_to.description: Critique Perl source code for best-practices.
